divs: sighting detailsthis event started on a sunday night in december of 2006. i was driving home around 9:30-10:00pm from my sisters house on my way home from watching football. i was driving north on a county road and came over a hill and noticed a strange red light moving through the trees at the edge of a field ahead of me. at first i thought it might have been a helicopter hovering but as i got closer noticed it wasn't making any sound and was much to big to be one. i got close and drove up a hill and looked out my side window and it was hovering above a house approx. 40-50 yards off the ground. i immediately stopped my car in the road and stared at this thing in amazement. after a minute or so a few other cars stopped and i could see them gazing as well. the triangle appeared to be black in color, with three red lights on it,one at each corner. it floated there for a few minutes making almost no sound at all except for a very low humming sound. it slowly turned sideways and began to slowly fly away. i was holding up traffic at this point,(along with other cars) so i decided i would go down the road and turn around and come back. i did so but when i returned to the site, it was gone. none of the other cars were there either, which i thought was odd. i eventually went home and told others of this event and basically got laughed at. i checked out the internet and local papers for a few days after and couldn't find anything about this. i'm not sure if the other drivers reported this to anyone, but i feel came across your site and feel obligated to report this strange object.i also have a friend who said he saw a similar triangle shaped object a few years earlier while driving home at night with his father. i told him my story while fishing with him earlier this summer and he immediately said "i saw the same thing!" i'm not sure what it was, but if anyone from the brazil\carbon area has seen this strange thing please report it. it would make me feel better and maybe less crazy!
